author: Staff Reporter
text:
One-year RI for man

Thoothukudi Fast Track Mahila Court Judge J. Flora on Wednesday sentenced a man, accused of hurting a woman, to undergo one year of rigorous imprisonment. According to prosecution, M. Ganesan (47) of Kilakulam was found guilty of hurting Jeyakodi (44) of Pillaiyar Kovil Street at the village.

As Jeyakodi volunteered to lodge a complaint against Ganesan, who assaulted a brother of the woman victim, owing to enmity, he was irked by her attitude and hurt her.

Seydunganallur police filed a case in 2015. Fine of Rs.1,000 was imposed on the accused.
title: One year RI for man
